typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 10,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'adftarget',
	fileName: 'adftest.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sheet1',
	range: 'A1:B5',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
